website_summaries.verdict: Unit can be hung on the wall or over a door to meet the needs of your available space.
pros: Provides a lot of hooks for storing jewelry, so it's especially good for necklaces
Includes a specific area for storing rings securely
Plenty of felt on the inside to prevent scratches on your jewelry
Glass mirror on the front of the armoire for convenience
cons: Some quality control issues with packaging and manufacturing

customer_reviews.title: Great price for great product
customer_reviews.text: It showed up nicely packaged and nothing was broken. Which was more than I could say for the one I bought at Bed Bath and Beyond which I bought locally and for more money. It has ample space, and is not too cheaply made. Everything was tightly put together. The mirror quality was great and the key lock worked fine. For the cost it is good quality and I would recommend it to anyone interested! It fastens to a wall or door so it makes it easy.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Gonzales

customer_reviews.title: Cleaned up my jewelry. So neat!
customer_reviews.text: I love my jewelry cabinet. I have a lot of jewelry and needed an organized way to keep it. I did modify the cabinet to hold more earrings by adding small hooks in each hole in the earring area, plus adding more around the ring section. Very well made cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: mickymouth

customer_reviews.title: Good solution but best if wall mounted
customer_reviews.text: Great storage solution for jewelry, but hanging on the door hasn't been perfect. It doesn't fit snuggly enough over the top of my standard indoor doors, but it's nice. I wish the earring slots were made of narrower wood, some of my earrings don't fit because the boards are too think.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: I like it, BUT......
customer_reviews.text: Too many ring slots which means wasted space and stud earrings will not fit in the earring slots because the wood rack is too thick. To be fair, however, most of the other jewelry armoires that I reviewed also had too many ring slots. Otherwise, I like the unit. It is well built with strong magnetic clasp and just fits wall mounted behind my bedroom door.
customer_reviews.author: smart consumer

customer_reviews.title: this has been a great addition to my organization
customer_reviews.text: So far, this has been a great addition to my organization. Arrived very quickly and completely intact. Love being able to display all my jewelry so nothing gets overlooked. Hoping the silver cloth is truly silver cloth and I won't have to worry about tarnish.
customer_reviews.author: bish-nm

customer_reviews.title: I like it.
customer_reviews.text: Every time I open the closet door which this is hanging on, it swings and bumps against the door. Other than that, I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Whiting

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, great for the necklace collector
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that it has focus on necklaces, I have a tabletop spinning one, too. Back to this item, it is very sturdy and arrived in perfect condition. Nice appearance. Very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Saved floor space
customer_reviews.text: Provided more jewelry space and seems to be well made
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Kay

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the ease in setting this up. Stores so much jewelry!
customer_reviews.author: Tracie

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for this product all my life. I can finally see all that I own in an organized manner.
customer_reviews.author: Giuli

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Helps keep your jewelry organized. Lots of hooks for hanging necklaces.
customer_reviews.author: Helen J. Gara

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this mirror cabinet. I've told all my friends. I only wish I had gotten it earlier since it simplified my life.
customer_reviews.author: Delacuba

customer_reviews.title: H
customer_reviews.text: Overall I love this! But I used the door hangers and the screws provided are too small.
customer_reviews.author: cassie

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my wife and all her jewelry and it is everything as described and am happy with the purchase. Was easy to mount on the wall and was delivered 3 days earlier than anticipated. Was very pleased with this purchase and would recommend to friends/family.
customer_reviews.author: stuart

customer_reviews.title: Get it!
customer_reviews.text: Holding up very well after a few years. My wife loves it!
customer_reviews.author: silas m

customer_reviews.title: Broken upon arrival
customer_reviews.text: I have one already and love it. I ordered one for my mother as a gift and it was damaged when she opened it. It definitely needs to be packaged better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Faulty lock
customer_reviews.text: The case itself is nice but the lock jams constantly.
customer_reviews.author: BJ

customer_reviews.title: The write up for this item used it to hold ...
customer_reviews.text: The write up for this item used it to hold makeup also --- I ordered this for my granddaughter and am having a hard time finding containers to hook in the Armoire that are narrow enough for the door to close. ---- but she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Linda W Hillyer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just make certain you know which way the door opens up!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loved it! Now my jewelry is so organized and ...
customer_reviews.text: Loved it! Now my jewelry is so organized and easy to Find. Well made, easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Jewelry Armoire
customer_reviews.text: Just what the wife wanted and the price was right. We inserted the armoire in the wall between two studs.
customer_reviews.author: XXTCHR

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install and I love having my jewelry organized!
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nicely made, but used too much space for rings when room for bracelets were needed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly in my bathroom and holds all of my jewelry.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love it. I have mine hanging on on my closet door an it blends in nicely
customer_reviews.author: Diane Williams

customer_reviews.title: Perfect jewelry organizer !
customer_reviews.text: Love it! All my jewelry is organized and easy to find!
customer_reviews.author: Silvia Fiumara

customer_reviews.title: Inspect before you sign off.
customer_reviews.text: It came split at the joint and cracked at the inside top. Quality control?. I did not send it back as it was to difficult to repackage . I hired a handy man to patch the obvious.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Brown

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately because of the way it was packaged I haven't ...
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately because of the way it was packaged I haven't been abled to use it. It does not come assembled and very vague directions on how to put it together. More explanatory directions would have been helpful. Or just package it already assembled.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is the most amazing piece. Packaged unbelievably well but easy to unpack
customer_reviews.text: This is the most amazing piece. Packaged unbelievably well but easy to unpack. Completely assembled and ready to hang. Plenty of room for my years of accumulation of pieces. Have lots of room left. Did have a couple of small screws out on one corner of the mirror but was an easy fix. Looks very nice on the wall and not expected to be containing jewelry. I truly love this piece.
customer_reviews.author: teresa jan learue

customer_reviews.title: As good as it gets!
customer_reviews.text: This is the closest I could find to fit my needs perfectly. Decent quality and perfect for a person that have too many necklaces. There is room to fit more hooks, which is my next step. Not only do I plan to add more hooks to this unit, but will also be making use of ALL space inside this cabinet - an area to maximize bracelets and more. Side note, the mirror happens to be the kind that is more flattering - Ladies, you know what I mean!
customer_reviews.author: Mickey

customer_reviews.title: Jewelry Armoire in wall improviisd
customer_reviews.text: Came assembled. We are going to install it in a wall. Have not done it yet. It was pretty much what I wanted. Lots of room for jewelry The older version I have in another closet. It was more detailed with routing on the wood by the miror and it opened with hinges that allowed the door to move forward.. This one opens up with no movement meaning it will have to be mounted in the wall with some protrusion from the wall to accomodate opening the door. Other than that it iwill meet the purpose
customer_reviews.author: Vicki P.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent jewelry armoire
customer_reviews.text: Excellent jewelry armoire, fits perfectly behind my bedroom door. I was able to hang my necklaces of all different lengths. Great deal of space dedicated for rings and earings that if not needed can be used to hang necklaces.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lots of necklace storage space!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great storage piece. It came quickly and was in perfect shape. I hung it on a closet door and it works perfectly. I really needed it for necklaces. The only negative was I ordered a white cabinet and the over door hangers were black metal. I spray painted them white before I hung it - so it is fixed but that was disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth B

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, but arrived somewhat damaged.
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this cabinet. Would have given it 5 stars but am giving it 4, because it did arrive with a couple of chips. Because of the location the damage was not terribly noticeable so I did not bother with an exchange.
customer_reviews.author: Book Worm

customer_reviews.title: Item arrived in excellent condition. I love the look of it
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived in excellent condition. I love the look of it. It works perfectly in the space I planned it for. I would've given it a 5 if it'd have had a little better storage space (3 small bins in the bottom to hold bracelets, watches, etc. aren't very big, at all). Overall, I would recommend it. I wouldn't have paid any more for this product however. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Gustin

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: seems sturdy, holds a good amount. There is a smell with the lining that is a little potent when you first use it but is lessens with time. I suspect it's the anti tarnish ingredients. I find the earring section to work well with some earrings, not as well with others.
customer_reviews.author: skigirl26

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Armoire gives a single point to look at the jewelry available. Well organized. Easy to set up. Though my wife wanted it hung over a door, I think it would have been better on the wall. It does come with the hardware for hanging over a door or to secure it to the wall.
customer_reviews.author: John Hanlon

customer_reviews.title: Now I can see all of my jewelry 👍
customer_reviews.text: I love the look, the mirror, the amount of hooks for my necklaces, the key lock, the way it came packed carefully to ship safely....this was a great gift to myself!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah W.

customer_reviews.title: wished I heard of this before
customer_reviews.text: This is a great way to store jewelry. Used to have a standing armoire but this makes more sense and uses less floor space. Lots of hooks and slots. Highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: barbara

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with it so far (in use about 3 weeks)
customer_reviews.text: Was going to set into studs but ended up hanging on wall. Very happy with it so far (in use about 3 weeks). Magnetic closure does catch the close hanging necklaces, but overall very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product. I have a lot of stud earrings ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. I have a lot of stud earrings and rings and everything fit perfectly. The length of the mirror in front is great for checking out your outfit.
customer_reviews.author: Simone

customer_reviews.title: Good product, one flaw
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife as an early birthday gift. Looks great and plenty of storage for all her jewelry. However the keyhole broke, its pretty fragile when you insert the key to lock.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: First one arrived broken but I packed it up and ...
customer_reviews.text: First one arrived broken but I packed it up and returned it and ordered a new one with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Amy W.

customer_reviews.title: Good piece.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome, easy to mount and quickly filled by my wife. Made her happy. Received in perfect shape.
customer_reviews.author: Robert L Dillon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this jewelry box! Works perfectly for all my necklaces.
customer_reviews.author: cindycntn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughter and it was exactly what she wanted
customer_reviews.author: Judy Gray

customer_reviews.title: perfect fit for my wife's closet door
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and undamaged. perfect fit for my wife's closet door. Well made.
customer_reviews.author: Dunjo

customer_reviews.title: Shocked!
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was so slow and after endless phone calls and tracking this finally arrived. Beautifully packed and was well worth waiting for. Well made easy to hang and exactly the size I expected. Nothing was overlooked, no nicks or missing paint. I'm very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: need to own!
customer_reviews.text: This item is wonderful! Best purchase ever! Well made! Holds a ton....
customer_reviews.author: Tammy L Rollins

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't have had a better experience working with Organizedlife
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't have had a better experience working with Organizedlife. They were great in helping me with my order. A really great product and very friendly company.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Wall Mount Jewelry Armoire Wooden Over The Door Cabinet with Lock Bedroom Chest Cosmetic Organizer
feature_bullets: Made of Firm Mdf Wood With Beautiful White Finish
Hang on the wall or hang over the door to help you save space,includes hanging brackets and screws
Inner lining with cushion of finger ring holder,anti-tarnish felt avoid jewelry eroding and protect jewelry from scratches
Elegant style,space-saving design with real glass mirror convenient for your dressing or makeup
Lot of space to stores your jewelry safely with lock and in a organized manner
Overall dimensions: 48 inches high x 14.6 inches wide x 3.7 inches deep

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars92 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
specifications.Fabric Type: Made of Firm Mdf Wood With Beautiful White Finish
